doc.title: Once Upon a Time in Siberia
doc.plot: This film travels to Russia's 'Wild Wild East' to follow Vitaly Dymochka as he tries to go legit in order to pursue the unlikeliest of dreams: making it as a film director with an action trilogy based on his own violent past - starring himself and other real life bandits. Featuring unique access into a secret world, Once Upon a Time in Siberia is a comic yet ultimately chilling look at everyday life inside the Russian mafia.
